name: Redirect and Alias Manager
description: Validates and manages redirects and aliases for articles, detecting chains/cycles and emitting routing-compatible redirect artifacts to preserve stable URLs during refactors.

parameters.redirect_key: Frontmatter key used to declare redirects/aliases (e.g., redirects, aliases)
parameters.max_chain_length: Maximum allowed redirect chain length before warning/error (default: 1)
parameters.strict: boolean flag to treat warnings as errors

responsibilities: Parse redirect/alias declarations from frontmatter or dedicated config files
Emit build artifacts compatible with the routing/static site framework
Produce actionable diagnostics for broken or ambiguous redirects
